Madillo Limerick
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Madillo Limerick
By Icelord13 on Sunday, January 11, 2004 - 01:08 pm:

This is just a nice short piece I put together. It's kinda funny, and it just goes to show you that I don't like madillos.

Madillo’s shell is very hard,
Even as tough as a diamond shard.
In battle, he’s strong
And he’d last pretty long
If only he wasn’t a retard.

Stupid Madillos!

By Icelord13 on Sunday, January 11, 2004 - 05:08 pm:

Madillo sub breeds are pretty cool cause you get the def without the retarded part. But I still hate main breed madillo
